plot: A man frees his fiancée from a cavalier's dungeon. They are tracked by bloodhounds, caught and shot.
title: True Till Death
plot_es: A man frees his fiancée from a cavalier's dungeon. They are tracked by bloodhounds, caught and shot.
plot_en: A man frees his fiancée from a cavalier's dungeon. They are tracked by bloodhounds, caught and shot.
